name: Panagiotis (Panos) Antivasis
aboutme: I am an exceptionally motivated individual, deeply passionate about technology and equipped with a strong foundation in programming, software development, and signal processing. My dedication to problem-solving, coupled with a relentless pursuit of excellence, positions me as a valuable addition to any team in the field of Computer Science. With a keen eye for detail and a drive to surpass expectations, I am eager to leverage my skills and expertise to drive innovation and make a meaningful impact.

education.title: MSc in Informatics Engineering
education.description: My undergraduate education provided me with knowledge that allowed me to put my thoughts into practice and broaden my knowledge and expertise.

education.title: BSc in Computer Science
education.description: Became conversant with a variety of programming languages and software engineering expertise, as well as the fundamental ideas of signal processing.

experience.description: Currently improving my back-end development skill sets through my work on many EU-funded projects such as Mine.io and CYBERUNITY.
